history.proof: qsimpl use: plus_zero_r. qsimpl use: plus_opp_l,plus_zero_r.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of plus_zero_r (plus _ zero) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment G : AbelianGroup H : forall x : G, plus x zero = x Unable to unify "plus (opp ?M2497) ?M2497 = zero" with "opp zero = zero".
